respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Check text against TLG Sophocles in order to discover if there are any missing whole words or lines..
Added speaker tags where they were missing.

$Log: soph.trach_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.6 2013-06-13 12:41:39 gcrane tagging now should be compatible with CTS
Revision 1.5 2012-11-20 18:47:12 ajones06 Changed the bibliographic information in the headers to reflect Francesco's discovery that the Greek text for these files was taken from the two-volume public domain Loeb version edited by Francis Storr.
Revision 1.4 2011-09-07 14:33:14 rsingh04 adding rend=displayNum to lb tags
Revision 1.3 2010-12-25 19:40:38 gcrane LB milestones instead of L tags
Revision 1.2 2010-12-24 13:05:03 gcrane ADD tags for lt/gt entities DEL tags for lsqb/rsqb entities
Revision 1.1 2010-12-24 12:51:11 gcrane base files for SDL
Revision 1.1 2009/12/08 18:56:08 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 16:30:24 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 15:03:39 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.10 2004/04/21 20:42:00 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.9 2003/07/01 22:18:08 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.8 2000/03/06 21:29:39 amahoney remove spurious headers
Revision 1.7 2000/03/04 20:35:17 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.6 2000/02/15 23:18:02 amahoney use n attribute on sp element to carry over the speaker name when the speech is interrupted by a card break; this also requires that the card break at the end come after the close of the sp, not within
Revision 1.5 2000/01/31 17:44:34 amahoney fix misspelled title
Revision 1.4 1999/11/24 21:12:08 amahoney Bring remaining files up to new DTD; use part=i and part=f for antilabe in all files

fwnei= de\ dou=los a)ndro\s w(s e)leuqe/rou
r(ai/oito: dei/pnois d' h(ni/k' h)=n w)|nwme/nos,
e)/rriyen e)kto\s au)to/n. w(=n e)/xwn xo/lon,
w(s i(/ket' au)=qis *)/ifitos *tirunqi/an
pro\s klitu/n, i(/ppous noma/das e)cixnoskopw=n,
to/t' a)/llos' au)to\n o)/mma, qate/ra| de\ nou=n
e)/xont', a)p' a)/kras h(=ke purgw/dous plako/s.
e)/rgou d' e(/kati tou=de mhni/sas a)/nac
o( tw=n a(pa/ntwn *zeu\s path\r *)olu/mpios
prato/n nin e)ce/pemyen ou)d' h)ne/sxeto,
o(qou/nek' au)to\n mou=non a)nqrw/pwn do/lw|
e)/kteinen: ei) ga\r e)mfanw=s h)mu/nato,
*zeu/s ta)\n sune/gnw cu\n di/kh| xeiroume/nw|:
u(/brin ga\r ou) ste/rgousin ou)de\ dai/mones.
kei=noi d' u(perxli/ontes e)k glw/sshs kakh=s
au)toi\ me\n *(/aidou pa/ntes ei)/s' oi)kh/tores,
po/lis de\ dou/lh: ta/sde d' a(/sper ei)sora=|s
e)c o)lbi/wn a)/zhlon eu(rou=sai bi/on
xwrou=si pro\s se/: tau=ta ga\r po/sis te so\s
e)fei=t', e)gw\ de\ pisto\s w)\n kei/nw| telw=.
au)to\n d' e)kei=non, eu)=t' a)\n a(gna\ qu/mata
r(e/ch| patrw/|w| *zhni\ th=s a(lw/sews,
fro/nei nin w(s h(/conta: tou=to ga\r lo/gou
pollou= kalw=s lexqe/ntos h(/diston klu/ein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/nassa, nu=n soi te/ryis e)mfanh\s kurei=,
tw=n me\n paro/ntwn, ta\ de\ pepusme/nh| lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: pw=s d' ou)k e)gw\ xai/roim' a)/n, a)ndro\s eu)tuxh=
klu/ousa pra=cin th/nde, pandi/kw| freni/;
pollh/ 'st' a)na/gkh th=|de tou=to suntre/xein.
o(/mws d' e)/nesti toi=sin eu)= skopoume/nois
tarbei=n to\n eu)= pra/ssonta, mh\ sfalh=| pote.
e)moi\ ga\r oi)=ktos deino\s ei)se/bh, fi/lai,
tau/tas o(rw/sh| duspo/tmous e)pi\ ce/nhs
xw/ras a)oi/kous a)pa/tora/s t' a)lwme/nas,
ai(\ pri\n me\n h)=san e)c e)leuqe/rwn i)/sws
a)ndrw=n, tanu=n de\ dou=lon i)/sxousin bi/on.
w)= *zeu= tropai=e, mh/ pot' ei)si/doimi/ se
pro\s tou)mo\n ou(/tw spe/rma xwrh/santa/ poi,
mhd', ei)/ ti dra/seis, th=sde/ ge zw/shs e)/ti.
ou(/tws e)gw\ de/doika ta/sd' o(rwme/nh.
w)= dusta/laina, ti/s pot' ei)= neani/dwn;
a)/nandros h)\ teknou=ssa; pro\s me\n ga\r fu/sin
pa/ntwn a)/peiros tw=nde, gennai/a de/ tis.
*li/xa, ti/nos pot' e)sti\n h( ce/nh brotw=n;
ti/s h( tekou=sa, ti/s d' o( fitu/sas path/r;
e)/ceip': e)pei/ nin tw=nde plei=ston w)/|ktisa
ble/pous', o(/sw|per kai\ fronei=n oi)=den mo/nh.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: ti/ d' oi)=d' e)gw/, ti/ d' a)/n me kai\ kri/nois; i)/sws
ge/nnhma tw=n e)kei=qen ou)k e)n u(sta/tois.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: mh\ tw=n tura/nnwn; *eu)ru/tou spora/ tis h)=n;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: ou)k oi)=da: kai\ ga\r ou)d' a)nisto/roun makra/n.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ou)d' o)/noma pro/s tou tw=n cunempo/rwn e)/xeis;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: h(/kista: sigh=| tou)mo\n e)/rgon h)/nuton.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ei)/p', w)= ta/lain', a)ll' h(mi\n e)k sauth=s, e)pei\
kai\ cumfora/ toi mh\ ei)de/nai se/ g' h(/tis ei)=.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: ou)/ ta)/ra tw=| ge pro/sqen ou)de\n e)c i)/sou
xro/nw| dih/sei glw=ssan, h(/tis ou)dama\
prou/fhnen ou)/te mei/zon' ou)/t' e)la/ssona,
a)ll' ai)e\n w)di/nousa sumfora=s ba/ros
dakrurroei= du/sthnos, e)c o(/tou pa/tran
dih/nemon le/loipen: h( de/ toi tu/xh
kakh\ me\n au)th=| g', a)lla\ suggnw/mhn e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: h( d' ou)=n e)a/sqw, kai\ poreue/sqw ste/gas
ou(/tws o(/pws h(/dista, mhde\ pro\s kakoi=s
toi=s ou)=sin a)/llhn pro/s g' e)mou= lu/phn la/bh|:
a(/lis ga\r h( parou=sa. pro\s de\ dw/mata
xwrw=men h)/dh pa/ntes, w(s su/ q' oi(= qe/leis
speu/dh|s, e)gw/ te ta)/ndon e)carkh= tiqw=.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: au)tou= ge prw=ton baio\n a)mmei/nas', o(/pws
ma/qh|s a)/neu tw=nd', ou(/stina/s t' a)/geis e)/sw,
w(=n t' ou)de\n ei)sh/kousas e)kma/qh|s a(\ dei=:
tou/twn e)/xw ga\r pa/nt' e)pisth/mhn e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ti/ d' e)sti/; tou= me th/nd' e)fi/stasai ba/sin;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: staqei=s' a)/kouson: kai\ ga\r ou)de\ to\n pa/ros
mu=qon ma/thn h)/kousas, ou)de\ nu=n dokw=.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: po/teron e)kei/nous dh=ta deu=r' au)=qis pa/lin
kalw=men, h)\ 'moi\ tai=sde/ t' e)ceipei=n qe/leis;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: soi\ tai=sde/ t' ou)de\n ei)/rgetai, tou/tous d' e)/a.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: kai\ dh\ beba=si, xw) lo/gos shmaine/tw.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: a(nh\r o(/d' ou)de\n w(=n e)/lecen a)rti/ws
fwnei= di/khs e)s o)rqo/n, a)ll' h)\ nu=n kako\s
h)\ pro/sqen ou) di/kaios a)/ggelos parh=n.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ti/ fh/s; safw=s moi fra/ze pa=n o(/son noei=s.
a(\ me\n ga\r e)cei/rhkas a)gnoi/a m' e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: tou/tou le/gontos ta)ndro\s ei)sh/kous' e)gw/,
pollw=n paro/ntwn martu/rwn, w(s th=s ko/rhs
tau/ths e(/kati kei=nos *eu)/ruto/n q' e(/loi
th/n q' u(yi/purgon *oi)xali/an, *)/erws de/ nin
mo/nos qew=n qe/lceien ai)xma/sai ta/de,
ou) ta)pi\ *ludoi=s ou)d' u(p' *)omfa/lh| po/nwn
latreu/mat' ou)d' o( r(ipto\s *)ifi/tou mo/ros:
o(\n nu=n parw/sas ou(=tos e)/mpalin le/gei.
a)ll' h(ni/k' ou)k e)/peiqe to\n futospo/ron
th\n pai=da dou=nai, kru/fion w(s e)/xoi le/xos,
e)/gklhma mikro\n ai)ti/an q' e(toima/sas
e)pistrateu/ei patri/da th\n tau/ths, e)n h(=|
to\n *eu)/ruton to/nd' ei)=pe despo/zein qro/nwn,
ktei/nei t' a)/nakta pate/ra th=sde kai\ po/lin
e)/perse. kai\ nu=n, w(s o(ra=|s, h(/kei do/mous
w(s tou/sde pe/mpwn ou)k a)fronti/stws, gu/nai,
ou)d' w(/ste dou/lhn: mhde\ prosdo/ka to/de:
ou)d' ei)ko/s, ei)/per e)nteqe/rmantai po/qw|.
e)/docen ou)=n moi pro\s se\ dhlw=sai to\ pa=n,
de/spoin', o(\ tou=de tugxa/nw maqw\n pa/ra.
kai\ tau=ta polloi\ pro\s me/sh| *traxini/wn
a)gora=| sunech/kouon w(sau/tws e)moi/,
w(/st' e)cele/gxein: ei) de\ mh\ le/gw fi/la,
ou)x h(/domai, to\ d' o)rqo\n e)cei/rhx' o(/mws.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: oi)/moi ta/laina, pou= pot' ei)mi\ pra/gmatos;
ti/n' ei)sde/degmai phmonh\n u(po/stegon
laqrai=on; w)= du/sthnos: a)=r' a)nw/numos
pe/fuken, w(/sper ou(pa/gwn diw/mnuto;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: h)= ka/rta lampra\ kai\ kat' o)/noma kai\ fu/sin,
patro\s me\n ou)=sa ge/nesin *eu)ru/tou pote\
*)io/lh 'kalei=to, th=s e)kei=nos ou)dama\
bla/stas e)fw/nei, dh=qen ou)de\n i(storw=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o)/lointo—mh/ ti pa/ntes oi( kakoi/, ta\ de\
laqrai=' o(\s a)skei= mh\ pre/pont' au)tw=| kaka/.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ti/ xrh\ poei=n, gunai=kes; w(s e)gw\ lo/gois
toi=s nu=n parou=sin e)kpeplhgme/nh kurw=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: peu/qou molou=sa ta)ndro/s, w(s ta/x' a)\n safh=
le/ceien, ei)/ nin pro\s bi/an kri/nein qe/lois.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: a)ll' ei)=mi: kai\ ga\r ou)k a)po\ gnw/mhs le/geis.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: h(mei=s de\ prosme/nwmen; h)\ ti/ xrh\ poei=n;

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: mi/mn', w(s o(/d' a)nh\r ou)k e)mw=n u(p' a)gge/lwn,
a)ll' au)to/klhtos e)k do/mwn poreu/etai.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: ti/ xrh/, gu/nai, molo/nta m' *(hraklei= le/gein;
di/dacon, w(s e(/rpontos, w(s o(ra=|s, e)mou=.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: w(s e)k taxei/as su\n xro/nw| bradei= molw\n
a)/|sseis, pri\n h(ma=s ka)nnew/sasqai lo/gous.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: a)ll' ei)/ ti xrh/|zeis i(storei=n, pa/reim' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: h)= kai\ to\ pisto\n th=s a)lhqei/as ne/meis;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: i)/stw me/gas *zeu/s, w(=n g' a)\n e)ceidw\s kurw=.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ti/s h( gunh\ dh=t' e)sti\n h(\n h(/keis a)/gwn;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: *eu)boii/s: w(=n d' e)/blasten ou)k e)/xw le/gein.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: ou(=tos, ble/f' w(=de: pro\s ti/n' e)nne/pein dokei=s;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: su\ d' ei)s ti/ dh/ me tou=t' e)rwth/sas e)/xeis;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: to/lmhson ei)pei=n, ei) fronei=s, o(/ s' i(storw=.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: pro\s th\n kratou=san *dh|a/neiran, *oi)ne/ws
ko/rhn da/marta/ q' *(hrakle/ous, ei) mh\ kurw=
leu/sswn ma/taia, despo/tin te th\n e)mh/n.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: tou=t' au)/t' e)/xrh|zon, tou=to/ sou maqei=n: le/geis de/spoinan ei)=nai th/nde sh/n;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: di/kaia ga/r.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: ti/ dh=ta; poi/an a)cioi=s dou=nai di/khn,
h)\n eu(reqh=|s e)s th/nde mh\ di/kaios w)/n;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: pw=s mh\ di/kaios; ti/ pote poiki/las e)/xeis;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: ou)de/n: su\ me/ntoi ka/rta tou=to drw=n kurei=s.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: a)/peimi: mw=ros d' h)= pa/lai klu/wn se/qen.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: ou)/, pri/n g' a)\n ei)/ph|s i(storou/menos braxu/.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: le/g', ei)/ ti xrh/|zeis: kai\ ga\r ou) sighlo\s ei)=.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: th\n ai)xma/lwton, h(\n e)/pemyas e)s do/mous, ka/toisqa dh/pou;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: fhmi/: pro\s ti/ d' i(storei=s;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: ou)/koun su\ tau/thn, h(\n u(p' a)gnoi/as o(ra=|s,
*)io/lhn e)/faskes *eu)ru/tou spora\n a)/gein;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: poi/ois e)n a)nqrw/poisi; ti/s po/qen molw\n
soi\ marturh/sei tau=t' e)mou= klu/ein pa/ra;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: polloi=sin a)stw=n: e)n me/sh| *traxini/wn
a)gora=| polu/s sou tau=ta/ g' ei)sh/kous' o)/xlos.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: klu/ein g' e)/faskon: tau)to\ d' ou)xi\ gi/gnetai
do/khsin ei)pei=n ka)cakribw=sai lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: poi/an do/khsin; ou)k e)pw/motos le/gwn
da/mart' e)/faskes *(hraklei= tau/thn a)/gein;

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: e)gw\ da/marta; pro\s qew=n, fra/son, fi/lh
de/spoina, to/nde ti/s pot' e)sti\n o( ce/nos.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: o(\s sou= parw\n h)/kousen, w(s tau/ths po/qw|
po/lis damei/h pa=sa, kou)x h( *ludi/a
pe/rseien au)th/n, a)ll' o( th=sd' e)/rws fanei/s.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: a(/nqrwpos, w)= de/spoin', a)posth/tw: to\ ga\r
nosou=nti lhrei=n a)ndro\s ou)xi\ sw/fronos.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: mh/, pro/s se tou= kat' a)/kron *oi)tai=on na/pos
*dio\s katastra/ptontos, e)kkle/yh|s lo/gon.
ou) ga\r gunaiki\ tou\s lo/gous e)rei=s kakh=|
ou)d' h(/tis ou) ka/toide ta)nqrw/pwn, o(/ti
xai/rein pe/fuken ou)xi\ toi=s au)toi=s a)ei/.
*)/erwti me/n nun o(/stis a)ntani/statai
pu/kths o(/pws e)s xei=ras, ou) kalw=s fronei=:
ou(=tos ga\r a)/rxei kai\ qew=n o(/pws qe/lei,
ka)mou= ge: pw=s d' ou) xa)te/ras oi(/as g' e)mou=;
w(/st' ei)/ ti tw)mw=| t' a)ndri\ th=|de th=| no/sw|
lhfqe/nti mempto/s ei)mi, ka/rta mai/nomai,
h)\ th=|de th=| gunaiki\ th=| metaiti/a|
tou= mhde\n ai)sxrou= mhd' e)moi\ kakou= tinos.
ou)k e)/sti tau=t': a)ll' ei) me\n e)k kei/nou maqw\n
yeu/dei, ma/qhsin ou) kalh\n e)kmanqa/neis.
ei) d' au)to\s au(to\n w(=de paideu/eis, o(/tan
qe/lh|s gene/sqai xrhsto/s, o)fqh/sei kako/s.
a)ll' ei)pe\ pa=n ta)lhqe/s: w(s e)leuqe/rw|
yeudei= kalei=sqai kh\r pro/sestin ou) kalh/.
o(/pws de\ lh/seis, ou)de\ tou=to gi/gnetai:
polloi\ ga\r oi(=s ei)/rhkas, oi(\ fra/sous' e)moi/.
kei) me\n de/doikas, ou) kalw=s tarbei=s, e)pei\
to\ mh\ puqe/sqai, tou=to/ m' a)lgu/neien a)/n:
to\ d' ei)de/nai ti/ deino/n; ou)xi\ xa)te/ras
plei/stas a)nh\r ei(=s *(hraklh=s e)/ghme dh/;
kou)/pw tis au)tw=n e)/k g' e)mou= lo/gon kako\n
h)ne/gkat' ou)d' o)/neidos: h(/de t' ou)d' a)\n ei)
ka/rt' e)ntakei/h tw=| filei=n, e)pei/ sf' e)gw\
w)/|ktira dh\ ma/lista prosble/yas', o(/ti
to\ ka/llos au)th=s to\n bi/on diw/lesen,
kai\ gh=n patrw/|an ou)x e(kou=sa du/smoros
e)/perse ka)dou/lwsen. a)lla\ tau=ta me\n
r(ei/tw kat' ou)=ron: soi\ d' e)gw\ fra/zw kako\n
pro\s a)/llon ei)=nai, pro\s d' e)/m' a)yeudei=n a)ei/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pei/qou legou/sh| xrhsta/, kou) me/myei xro/nw|
gunaiki\ th=|de ka)p' e)mou= kth/sei xa/rin.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: a)ll', w)= fi/lh de/spoin', e)pei/ se manqa/nw
qnhth\n fronou=san qnhta\ kou)k a)gnw/mona,
pa=n soi fra/sw ta)lhqe\s ou)de\ kru/yomai.
e)/stin ga\r ou(/tws w(/sper ou(=tos e)nne/pei.
tau/ths o( deino\s i(/mero/s poq' *(hraklh=
dih=lqe, kai\ th=sd' ei(/nex' h( polu/fqoros
kaqh|re/qh patrw=|os *oi)xali/a do/rei.
kai\ tau=ta, dei= ga\r kai\ to\ pro\s kei/nou le/gein,
ou)/t' ei)=pe kru/ptein ou)/t' a)phrnh/qh pote/,
a)ll' au)to/s, w)= de/spoina, deimai/nwn to\ so\n
mh\ ste/rnon a)lgu/noimi toi=sde toi=s lo/gois,
h(/marton, ei)/ ti th/nd' a(marti/an ne/meis.
e)pei/ ge me\n dh\ pa/nt' e)pi/stasai lo/gon,
kei/nou te kai\ sh\n e)c i)/sou koinh\n xa/rin
kai\ ste/rge th\n gunai=ka kai\ bou/lou lo/gous,
ou(\s ei)=pas e)s th/nd', e)mpe/dws ei)rhke/nai:
w(s ta)/ll' e)kei=nos pa/nt' a)risteu/wn xeroi=n
tou= th=sd' e)/rwtos ei)s a(/panq' h(/sswn e)/fu.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: a)ll' w(=de kai\ fronou=men w(/ste tau=ta dra=n,
kou)/toi no/son g' e)pakto\n e)carou/meqa,
qeoi=si dusmaxou=ntes. a)ll' ei)/sw ste/ghs
xwrw=men, w(s lo/gwn t' e)pistola\s fe/rh|s,
a(/ t' a)nti\ dw/rwn dw=ra xrh\ prosarmo/sai,
kai\ tau=t' a)/gh|s: keno\n ga\r ou) di/kaia/ se
xwrei=n proselqo/nq' w(=de su\n pollw=| sto/lw|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: me/ga ti sqe/nos a( *ku/pris e)kfe/retai ni/kas a)ei/.
kai\ ta\ me\n qew=n
pare/ban, kai\ o(/pws *kroni/dan a)pa/tasen ou) le/gw,
ou)de\ to\n e)/nnuxon *(/aidan
h)\ *poseida/wna tina/ktora gai/as:
a)ll' e)pi\ ta/nd' a)/r' a)/koitin
ti/nes a)mfi/guoi kate/ban pro\ ga/mwn,
ti/nes pa/mplhkta pagko/nita/ t' e)ch=lqon a)/eql' a)gw/nwn;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o( me\n h)=n potamou= sqe/nos, u(yi/kerw tetrao/rou
fa/sma tau/rou,
*)axelw=|os a)p' *oi)niada=n, o( de\ *bakxi/as a)po\
h)=lqe pali/ntona *qh/bas
to/ca kai\ lo/gxas r(o/palo/n te tina/sswn,
pai=s *dio/s: oi(\ to/t' a)ollei=s
i)/san e)s me/son i(e/menoi lexe/wn:
mo/na d' eu)/lektros e)n me/sw| *ku/pris r(abdono/mei cunou=sa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: to/t' h)=n xero/s, h)=n de\ to/cwn pa/tagos,
taurei/wn t' a)na/migda kera/twn:
h)=n d' a)mfi/plektoi kli/makes,
h)=n de\ metw/pwn o)lo/enta
plh/gmata, kai\ sto/nos a)mfoi=n.
a( d' eu)w=pis a(bra\
thlaugei= par' o)/xqw|
h(=sto, to\n o(\n prosme/nous' a)koi/tan.
a)gw\n de\ marga=| me\n oi(=a fra/zw:
to\ d' a)mfinei/khton o)/mma nu/mfas
e)leino\n a)mme/nei:
ka)po\ matro\s a)/far be/baken,
w(/ste po/rtis e)rh/ma.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: h)=mos, fi/lai, kat' oi)=kon o( ce/nos qroei=
tai=s ai)xmalw/tois paisi\n w(s e)p' e)co/dw|,
th=mos qurai=os h)=lqon w(s u(ma=s la/qra|,
ta\ me\n fra/sousa xersi\n a(texnhsa/mhn,
ta\ d' oi(=a pa/sxw sugkatoiktioume/nh.
ko/rhn ga/r, oi)=mai d' ou)ke/t', a)ll' e)zeugme/nhn,
pareisde/degmai fo/rton w(/ste nauti/los,
lwbhto\n e)mpo/lhma th=s e)mh=s freno/s.
kai\ nu=n du/' ou)=sai mi/mnomen mia=s u(po\
xlai/nhs u(pagka/lisma. toia/d' *(hraklh=s,
o( pisto\s h(mi=n ka)gaqo\s kalou/menos,
oi)kou/ri' a)nte/pemye tou= makrou= xro/nou.
e)gw\ de\ qumou=sqai me\n ou)k e)pi/stamai
nosou=nti kei/nw| polla\ th=|de th=| no/sw|:
to\ d' au)= cunoikei=n th=|d' o(mou= ti/s a)\n gunh\
du/naito, koinwnou=sa tw=n au)tw=n ga/mwn;
o(rw= ga\r h(/bhn th\n me\n e(/rpousan pro/sw,
th\n de\ fqi/nousan: w(=n a)farpa/zein filei=
o)fqalmo\s a)/nqos, tw=n d' u(pektre/pei po/da.
tau=t' ou)=n fobou=mai mh\ po/sis me\n *(hraklh=s
e)mo\s kalh=tai, th=s newte/ras d' a)nh/r.
a)ll' ou) ga/r, w(/sper ei)=pon, o)rgai/nein kalo\n
gunai=ka nou=n e)/xousan: h(=| d' e)/xw, fi/lai,
luth/rion lw/fhma, th=|d' u(mi=n fra/sw.
h)=n moi palaio\n dw=ron a)rxai/ou pote\
qhro/s, le/bhti xalke/w| kekrumme/non,
o(\ pai=s e)/t' ou)=sa tou= dasuste/rnou para\
*ne/ssou fqi/nontos e)k fonw=n a)neilo/mhn,
o(\s to\n baqu/rroun potamo\n *eu)/hnon brotou\s
misqou= 'po/reue xersi/n, ou)/te pompi/mois
kw/pais e)re/sswn ou)/te lai/fesin new/s.
o(\s ka)me/, to\n patrw=|on h(ni/ka sto/lon
cu\n *(hraklei= to\ prw=ton eu)=nis e(spo/mhn,
fe/rwn e)p' w)/mois, h(ni/k' h)= me/sw| po/rw|,
yau/ei matai/ais xersi/n: e)k d' h)/us' e)gw/,
xw) *zhno\s eu)qu\s pai=s e)pistre/yas xeroi=n
h(=ken komh/thn i)o/n: e)s de\ pleu/monas
ste/rnwn dierroi/zhsen. e)kqnh/|skwn d' o( qh\r
tosou=ton ei)=pe: pai= ge/rontos *oi)ne/ws,
toso/nd' o)nh/sei tw=n e)mw=n, e)a\n pi/qh|,
porqmw=n, o(qou/nex' u(sta/thn s' e)/pemy' e)gw/:
e)a\n ga\r a)mfi/qrepton ai(=ma tw=n e)mw=n
sfagw=n e)ne/gkh| xersi/n, h(=| melagxo/lous
e)/bayen i)ou\s qre/mma *lernai/as u(/dras,
e)/stai freno/s soi tou=to khlhth/rion
th=s *(hraklei/as, w(/ste mh/tin' ei)sidw\n
ste/rcei gunai=ka kei=nos a)nti\ sou= ple/on.
tou=t' e)nnoh/sas', w)= fi/lai, do/mois ga\r h)=n
kei/nou qano/ntos e)gkeklh|me/non kalw=s,
xitw=na to/nd' e)/baya, prosbalou=s' o(/sa
zw=n kei=nos ei)=pe: kai\ pepei/rantai ta/de.
kaka\s de\ to/lmas mh/t' e)pistai/mhn e)gw\
mh/t' e)kma/qoimi, ta/s te tolmw/sas stugw=:
fi/ltrois d' e)a/n pws th/nd' u(perbalw/meqa
th\n pai=da kai\ qe/lktroisi toi=s e)f' *(hraklei=,
memhxa/nhtai tou)/rgon, ei)/ ti mh\ dokw=
pra/ssein ma/taion: ei) de\ mh/, pepau/somai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' ei)/ tis e)sti\ pi/stis e)n toi=s drwme/nois,
dokei=s par' h(mi=n ou) bebouleu=sqai kakw=s.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ou(/tws e)/xei g' h( pi/stis, w(s to\ me\n dokei=n
e)/nesti, pei/ra| d' ou) proswmi/lhsa/ pw:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' ei)de/nai xrh\ drw=san, w(s ou)d' ei) dokei=s
e)/xein, e)/xois a)\n gnw=ma, mh\ peirwme/nh.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: a)ll' au)ti/k' ei)so/mesqa, to/nde ga\r ble/pw
qurai=on h)/dh: dia\ ta/xous d' e)leu/setai.
mo/non par' u(mw=n eu)= stegoi/meq': w(s sko/tw|
ka)\n ai)sxra\ pra/ssh|s, ou)/pot' ai)sxu/nh| pesei=.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: ti/ xrh\ poei=n; sh/maine, te/knon *oi)ne/ws,
w(s e)sme\n h)/dh tw=| makrw=| xro/nw| bradei=s.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: a)ll' au)ta\ dh/ soi tau=ta kai\ pra/ssw, *li/xa,
e(/ws su\ tai=s e)/swqen h)gorw= ce/nais,
o(/pws fe/rh|s moi to/nde tanau+fh= pe/plon,
dw/rhm' e)kei/nw| ta)ndri\ th=s e)mh=s xero/s.
didou\s de\ to/nde fra/z' o(/pws mhdei\s brotw=n
kei/nou pa/roiqen a)mfidu/setai xroi/+,
mhd' o)/yetai/ nin mh/te fe/ggos h(li/ou
mh/q' e(/rkos i(ero\n mh/t' e)fe/stion se/las,
pri\n kei=nos au)to\n fanero\s e)mfanw=s staqei\s
dei/ch| qeoi=sin h(me/ra| taurosfa/gw|.
ou(/tw ga\r hu)/gmhn, ei)/ pot' au)to\n e)s do/mous
i)/doimi swqe/nt' h)\ klu/oimi pandi/kws,
stelei=n xitw=ni tw=|de kai\ fanei=n qeoi=s
quth=ra kainw=| kaino\n e)n peplw/mati.
kai\ tw=nd' a)poi/seis sh=m', o(\ kei=nos eu)maqe\s
sfragi=dos e(/rkei tw=|d' e)po\n maqh/setai.
a)ll' e(/rpe, kai\ fu/lasse prw=ta me\n no/mon,
to\ mh\ 'piqumei=n pompo\s w)\n perissa\ dra=n:
e)/peiq' o(/pws a)\n h( xa/ris kei/nou te/ soi
ka)mou= cunelqou=s' e)c a(plh=s diplh= fanh=|.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: a)ll' ei)/per *(ermou= th/nde pompeu/w te/xnhn
be/baion, ou)/ ti mh\ sfalw= g' e)n soi/ pote,
to\ mh\ ou) to/d' a)/ggos w(s e)/xei dei=cai fe/rwn,
lo/gwn te pi/stin w(=n le/geis e)farmo/sai.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: stei/xois a)\n h)/dh: kai\ ga\r e)cepi/stasai
ta/ g' e)n do/moisin w(s e)/xonta tugxa/nei.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: e)pi/stamai/ te kai\ fra/sw seswsme/na.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: a)ll' oi)=sqa me\n dh\ kai\ ta\ th=s ce/nhs o(rw=n
prosde/gmat', au)th\n w(s e)deca/mhn fi/lws.

sp.speaker: *li/xas
sp.l: w(/st' e)kplagh=nai tou)mo\n h(donh=| ke/ar.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ti/ dh=t' a)\n a)/llo g' e)nne/pois; de/doika ga\r

mh\ prw\| le/gois a)
 to
 po/qon to
 e)c e)mou=,
pri\n ei)de/nai ta)kei=qen ei) poqou/meqa.

sp.l: w)= nau/loxa kai\ petrai=a
qerma\ loutra\ kai\ pa/gous
*oi)/tas paranaieta/ontes, oi(/ te me/ssan *mhli/da pa\r li/mnan
xrusalaka/tou t' a)kta\n ko/ras,
e)/nq' *(ella/nwn a)gorai\
*pula/tides kle/ontai:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o( kallibo/as ta/x' u(mi=n
au)lo\s ou)k a)narsi/an
a)xw=n kanaxa\n e)pa/neisin, a)lla\ qei/as a)nti/luron mou/sas.
o( ga\r *dio\s *)alkmh/nas ko/ros
sou=tai pa/sas a)reta=s
la/fur' e)/xwn e)p' oi)/kous:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o(\n a)po/ptolin ei)/xomen panta=|,
duokaideka/mhnon a)mme/nousai
xro/non, pela/gion, i)/dries ou)de/n:
a( de/ oi( fi/la da/mar
ta/lainan dusta/laina kardi/an
pa/gklautos ai)e\n w)/lluto:
nu=n d' *)/arhs oi)strhqei\s
e)ce/lus' e)pi/ponon a(me/ran.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)fi/koit' a)fi/koito: mh\ stai/h
polu/kwpon o)/xhma nao\s au)tw=|,
pri\n ta/nde pro\s po/lin a)nu/seie,
nasiw=tin e(sti/an
a)mei/yas, e)/nqa klh/|zetai quth/r:
o(/qen mo/loi pani/meros,
ta=s peiqou=s pagxri/stw|
sugkraqei\s e)pi\ profa/sei fa/rous.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: gunai=kes, w(s de/doika mh\ peraite/rw
pepragme/n' h)=| moi pa/nq' o(/s' a)rti/ws e)/drwn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ d' e)/sti, *dh|a/neira, te/knon *oi)ne/ws;

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ou)k oi)=d': a)qumw= d', ei) fanh/somai ta/xa
kako\n me/g' e)kpra/cas' a)p' e)lpi/dos kalh=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou) dh/ ti tw=n sw=n *(hraklei= dwrhma/twn;

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ma/lista/ g', w(/ste mh/pot' a)\n proqumi/an
a)/dhlon e)/rgou tw| paraine/sai labei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: di/dacon, ei) didakto/n, e)c o(/tou fobei=.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: toiou=ton e)kbe/bhken oi(=on, h)\n fra/sw,
gunai=kes, u(ma=s qau=m' a)ne/lpiston maqei=n.
w(=| ga\r to\n e)nduth=ra pe/plon a)rti/ws
e)/xrion, a)rgh\s oi)o\s eu)e/rou po/kos,
tou=t' h)fa/nistai dia/boron pro\s ou)deno\s
tw=n e)/ndon, a)ll' e)desto\n e)c au(tou= fqi/nei,
kai\ yh=| kat' a)/kras spila/dos: w(s d' ei)dh=|s a(/pan,
h(=| tou=t' e)pra/xqh, mei/zon' e)ktenw= lo/gon.
e)gw\ ga\r w(=n o( qh/r me *ke/ntauros, ponw=n
pleura\n pikra=| glwxi=ni, proudida/cato
parh=ka qesmw=n ou)de/n, a)ll' e)sw|zo/mhn
xalkh=s o(/pws du/snipton e)k de/ltou grafh/n.
kai/ moi ta/d' h)=n pro/rrhta kai\ toiau=t' e)/drwn:
to\ fa/rmakon tou=t' a)/puron a)kti=no/s t' a)ei\
qermh=s a)/qikton e)n muxoi=s sw/|zein e)me/,
e(/ws nin a)rti/xriston a(rmo/saimi/ pou.
ka)/drwn toiau=ta. nu=n d', o(/t' h)=n e)rgaste/on,
e)/xrisa me\n kat' oi)=kon e)n do/mois krufh=|
mallw=|, spa/sasa kthsi/ou botou= la/xnhn,
ka)/qhka sumptu/cas' a)lampe\s h(li/ou
koi/lw| zuga/strw| dw=ron, w(/sper ei)/dete.
ei)/sw d' a)postei/xousa de/rkomai fa/tin
a)/fraston, a)cu/mblhton a)nqrw/pw| maqei=n.
to\ ga\r ka/tagma tugxa/nw r(i/yasa/ pws
th=s oi)o/s, w(=| prou/xrion, e)s me/shn flo/ga,
a)kti=n' e)s h(liw=tin: w(s d' e)qa/lpeto,
r(ei= pa=n a)/dhlon kai\ kate/yhktai xqoni/,
morfh=| ma/list' ei)kasto\n w(/ste pri/onos
e)kbrw/mat' a)\n ble/yeias e)n tomh=| cu/lou.
toio/nde kei=tai propete/s: e)k de\ gh=s, o(/qen
prou/keit', a)naze/ousi qrombw/deis a)froi/,
glaukh=s o)pw/ras w(/ste pi/onos potou=
xuqe/ntos ei)s gh=n *bakxi/as a)p' a)mpe/lou.
w(/st' ou)k e)/xw ta/laina poi= gnw/mhs pe/sw:
o(rw= de/ m' e)/rgon deino\n e)ceirgasme/nhn.
po/qen ga\r a)/n pot', a)nti\ tou= qnh/|skwn o( qh\r
e)moi\ pare/sx' eu)/noian, h(=s e)/qnh|sx' u(/per;
ou)k e)/stin, a)lla\ to\n balo/nt' a)pofqi/sai
xrh/|zwn e)/qelge/ m': w(=n e)gw\ mequ/steron,
o(/t' ou)ke/t' a)rkei=, th\n ma/qhsin a)/rnumai.
mo/nh ga\r au)to/n, ei)/ ti mh\ yeusqh/somai
gnw/mhs, e)gw\ du/sthnos e)capofqerw=:
to\n ga\r balo/nt' a)/trakton oi)=da kai\ qeo\n
*xei/rwna phmh/nanta, xw)=nper a)\n qi/gh|,
fqei/rei ta\ pa/nta knw/dal': e)k de\ tou=d' o(/de
sfagw=n dielqw\n i)o\s ai(/matos me/las
pw=s ou)k o)lei= kai\ to/nde; do/ch| gou=n e)mh=|.
kai/toi de/doktai, kei=nos ei) sfalh/setai,
tau/th| su\n o(rmh=| ka)me\ sunqanei=n a(/ma:
zh=n ga\r kakw=s klu/ousan ou)k a)nasxeto/n,
h(/tis protima=| mh\ kakh\ pefuke/nai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tarbei=n me\n e)/rga dei/n' a)nagkai/ws e)/xei,
th\n d' e)lpi/d' ou) xrh\ th=s tu/xhs kri/nein pa/ros.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: ou)k e)/stin e)n toi=s mh\ kaloi=s bouleu/masin
ou)d' e)lpi/s, h(/tis kai\ qra/sos ti procenei=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' a)mfi\ toi=s sfalei=si mh\ 'c e(kousi/as
o)rgh\ pe/peira, th=s se tugxa/nein pre/pei.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: toiau=ta d' a)\n le/ceien ou)x o( tou= kakou=
koinwno/s, a)ll' w(=| mhde/n e)st' oi)/koi baru/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: siga=n a)\n a(rmo/zoi se to\n plei/w lo/gon,
ei) mh/ ti le/ceis paidi\ tw=| sauth=s: e)pei\
pa/resti, masth\r patro\s o(\s pri\n w)/|xeto.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: w)= mh=ter, w(s a)\n e)k triw=n s' e(\n ei(lo/mhn,
h)\ mhke/t' ei)=nai zw=san, h)\ seswsme/nhn
a)/llou keklh=sqai mhte/r', h)\ lw/|ous fre/nas
tw=n nu=n parousw=n tw=nd' a)mei/yasqai/ poqen.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira

sp.l:
to

pate/ra, kataktei/nasa th=|d' e)n h(me/ra|.

sp.l: oi)/moi, tin' e)ch/negkas, w)= te/knon, lo/gon;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: o(\n ou)x oi(=o/n te mh\ ou) telesqh=nai: to\ ga\r

fanqe
 ti/s a)
 du/nait' a)
 a)ge/nhton poei=n;

sp.l: pw=s ei)=pas, w)= pai=; tou= par' a)nqrw/pwn maqw\n
a)/zhlon ou(/tws e)/rgon ei)rga/sqai me fh/s;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: au)to\s barei=an cumfora\n e)n o)/mmasin
patro\s dedorkw\s kou) kata\ glw=ssan klu/wn.

sp.speaker: *dhia/neira
sp.l: pou= d' e)mpela/zeis ta)ndri\ kai\ pari/stasai;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: ei) xrh\ maqei=n se, pa/nta dh\ fwnei=n xrew/n.
o(/q' ei(=rpe kleinh\n *eu)ru/tou pe/rsas po/lin,
ni/khs a)/gwn tropai=a ka)kroqi/nia,
a)kth/ tis a)mfi/klustos *eu)boi/as a)/kron
*kh/naio/n e)stin, e)/nqa patrw/|w| *dii\
bwmou\s o(ri/zei temeni/an te fulla/da:
ou(= nin ta\ prw=t' e)sei=don a)/smenos po/qw|.
me/llonti d' au)tw=| poluqu/tous teu/xein sfaga\s
kh=ruc a)p' oi)/kwn i(/ket' oi)kei=os *li/xas,
to\ so\n fe/rwn dw/rhma, qana/simon pe/plon:
o(\n kei=nos e)ndu/s, w(s su\ proucefi/eso,
tauroktonei= me\n dw/dek' e)ntelei=s e)/xwn
lei/as a)parxh\n bou=s: a)ta\r ta\ pa/nq' o(mou=
e(kato\n prosh=ge summigh= boskh/mata.
kai\ prw=ta me\n dei/laios i(/lew| freni/,
ko/smw| te xai/rwn kai\ stolh=|, kathu/xeto:
o(/pws de\ semnw=n o)rgi/wn e)dai/eto
flo\c ai(mathra\ ka)po\ piei/ras druo/s,
i(drw\s a)nh/|ei xrwti/, kai\ prosptu/ssetai
pleurai=sin a)rti/kollos, w(/ste te/ktonos,
xitw\n a(/pan kat' a)/rqron: h)=lqe d' o)ste/wn
a)dagmo\s a)nti/spastos: ei)=ta foini/as
e)xqra=s e)xi/dnhs i)o\s w(\s e)dai/nuto.
e)ntau=qa dh\ 'bo/hse to\n dusdai/mona
*li/xan, to\n ou)de\n ai)/tion tou= sou= kakou=,
poi/ais e)ne/gkoi to/nde mhxanai=s pe/plon:
o( d' ou)de\n ei)dw\s du/smoros to\ so\n mo/nhs
dw/rhm' e)/lecen, w(/sper h)=n e)stalme/non.
ka)kei=nos w(s h)/kouse kai\ diw/dunos
sparagmo\s au)tou= pleumo/nwn a)nqh/yato,
ma/ryas podo/s nin, a)/rqron h(=| lugi/zetai,
r(iptei= pro\s a)mfi/kluston e)k po/ntou pe/tran:
ko/mhs de\ leuko\n muelo\n e)krai/nei, me/sou
krato\s diaspare/ntos ai(/mato/s q' o(mou=.
a(/pas d' a)nhufh/mhsen oi)mwgh=| lew/s,
tou= me\n nosou=ntos, tou= de\ diapepragme/nou:
kou)dei\s e)to/lma ta)ndro\s a)nti/on molei=n.
e)spa=to ga\r pe/donde kai\ meta/rsios,
bow=n, i)u/zwn: a)mfi\ d' e)ktu/poun pe/trai,
*lokrw=n t' o)/reioi prw=nes *eu)boi/as t' a)/krai.
e)pei\ d' a)pei=pe, polla\ me\n ta/las xqoni\
r(i/ptwn e(auto/n, polla\ d' oi)mwgh=| bow=n,
to\ duspa/reunon le/ktron e)ndatou/menos
sou= th=s talai/nhs, kai\ to\n *oi)ne/ws ga/mon
oi(=on katakth/saito lumanth\n bi/ou,
to/t' e)k prose/drou lignu/os dia/strofon
o)fqalmo\n a)/ras ei)=de/ m' e)n pollw=| stratw=|
dakrurroou=nta, kai/ me prosble/yas kalei=:
w)= pai=, pro/selqe, mh\ fu/gh|s tou)mo\n kako/n,
mhd' ei)/ se xrh\ qano/nti sunqanei=n e)moi/:
a)ll' a)=ron e)/cw, kai\ ma/lista me/n me qe\s
e)ntau=q' o(/pou me mh/ tis o)/yetai brotw=n:
ei) d' oi)=kton i)/sxeis, a)lla/ m' e)/k ge th=sde gh=s
po/rqmeuson w(s ta/xista, mhd' au)tou= qa/nw.
tosau=t' e)piskh/yantos, e)n me/sw| ska/fei
qe/ntes sfe pro\s gh=n th/nd' e)ke/lsamen mo/lis
bruxw/menon spasmoi=si: kai/ nin au)ti/ka
h)\ zw=nt' e)so/yesq' h)\ teqnhko/t' a)rti/ws.
toiau=ta, mh=ter, patri\ bouleu/sas' e)mw=|
kai\ drw=s' e)lh/fqhs, w(=n se poi/nimos *di/kh
ti/sait' *)erinu/s t'. ei) qe/mis d', e)peu/xomai:
qe/mis d', e)pei/ moi th\n qe/min su\ prou/bales,
pa/ntwn a)/riston a)/ndra tw=n e)pi\ xqoni\
ktei/nas', o(poi=on a)/llon ou)k o)/yei pote/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ si=g' a)fe/rpeis; ou) ka/toisq' o(qou/neka

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: e)a=t' a)fe/rpein: ou)=ros o)fqalmw=n e)mw=n
au)th=| ge/noit' a)/pwqen e(rpou/sh| kalo/s.
o)/gkon ga\r a)/llws o)no/matos ti/ dei= tre/fein
mhtrw=|on, h(/tis mhde\n w(s tekou=sa dra=|;
a)ll' e(rpe/tw xai/rousa: th\n de\ te/ryin h(\n
tw)mw=| di/dwsi patri/, th/nd' au)th\ la/boi.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: i)/d' oi(=on, w)= pai=des, prose/micen a)/far
tou)/pos to\ qeopro/pon h(mi=n
ta=s palaifa/tou pronoi/as,
o(/ t' e)/laken, o(po/te teleo/mhnos e)kfe/roi
dwde/katos a)/rotos, a)nadoxa\n telei=n po/nwn
tw=| *dio\s au)to/paidi: kai\ ta/d' o)rqw=s
e)/mpeda katouri/zei. pw=s ga\r a)\n o( mh\ leu/sswn
e)/ti pot' e)/t' e)pi/ponon po/nwn e)/xoi qanw\n latrei/an;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei) ga/r sfe *kentau/rou foni/a| nefe/la|
xri/ei dolopoio\s a)na/gka
pleura/, prostake/ntos i)ou=,
o(\n te/keto qa/natos, e)/trefe d' ai)o/los dra/kwn,
pw=s o(/d' a)\n a)e/lion e(/teron h)\ tanu=n i)/doi,
deinota/tw| me\n u(/dras prostetakw\s
fa/smati; melagxai/ta d' a)/mmiga/ nin ai)ki/zei
*ne/ssou u(pofo/nia dolio/muqa ke/ntr' e)pize/santa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w(=n a(/d' a( tla/mwn a)/oknos mega/lan proorw=sa
do/moisi bla/ban ne/wn
a)i/+ssousan ga/mwn ta\ me\n au)ta\ prose/bale, ta\
d' a)p' a)llo/qrou
gnw/mas molo/nt' o)leqri/aisi sunallagai=s
h)= pou o)loa\ ste/nei,
h)= pou a)dinw=n xlwra\n
te/ggei dakru/wn a)/xnan.
a( d' e)rxome/na moi=ra profai/nei doli/an
kai\ mega/lan a)/tan.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/rrwgen paga\ dakru/wn: ke/xutai no/sos, w)= po/poi,
oi(=on a)narsi/wn
ou)/pw *(hrakle/ous a)gakleito\n e)pe/mole pa/qos oi)kti/sai.
i)w\ kelaina\ lo/gxa proma/xou doro/s,
a(\ to/te qoa\n nu/mfan
a)/gages a)p' ai)peina=s
ta/nd' *oi)xali/as ai)xma=|:
a( d' a)mfi/polos *ku/pris a)/naudos fanera\
tw=nd' e)fa/nh pra/ktwr.

sp.speaker: *(hmixo/rion 1
sp.l: po/teron e)gw\ ma/taios, h)\ klu/w tino\s
oi)/ktou di' oi)/kwn a)rti/ws o(rmwme/nou; ti/ fhmi;

sp.speaker: *(hmixo/rion 2
sp.l: h)xei= tis ou)k a)/shmon, a)lla\ dustuxh=

sp.speaker: *(hmixo/rion

th/nd' w(s kathfh\s kai\ sunwfruwme/nh

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: w)= pai=des, w(s a)/r' h(mi\n ou) smikrw=n kakw=n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: be/bhke *dh|a/neira th\n panusta/thn
o(dw=n a(pasw=n e)c a)kinh/tou podo/s.

sp.l: ou) dh/ poq' w(s qanou=sa;

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: pa/nt' a)kh/koas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei)pe\ tw=| mo/rw|,
gu/nai, cuntre/xei.

a( ne/ortos a(/de nu/mfa

sp.l: a)/gan ge: ma=llon d', ei) parou=sa plhsi/a

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ tau=t' e)/tlh tis xei\r gunaikei/a kti/sai;

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: deinw=s ge: peu/sei d', w(/ste marturei=n e)moi/.
e)pei\ ga\r h)=lqe dwma/twn ei)/sw mo/nh
kai\ pai=d' e)n au)lai=s ei)=de koi=la de/mnia
stornu/nq', o(/pws a)/yorron a)ntw/|h patri/,

bruxa=to me\n bwmoi=si prospi/ptous' o(/ti
ge/noint' e)/rhmoi, 'klaie d' o)rga/nwn o(/tou
yau/seien oi(=s e)xrh=to deilai/a pa/ros:

ei)/ tou fi/lwn ble/yeien oi)ketw=n de/mas,
e)/klaien h( du/sthnos ei)sorwme/nh,
au)th\ to\n au(th=s dai/mon' a)nakaloume/nh

e)pei\ de\ tw=nd' e)/lhcen, e)cai/fnhs sf' o(rw=

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

pa=| pa=| mou yau/eis; poi= kli/neis;

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: w)= pai=, pou= pot' ei)=; ta=|de/ me ta=|de/ me
pro/slabe koufi/sas. e)\ e)/, i)w\ dai=mon.
qrw/|skei d' au)=, qrw/|skei deilai/a
diolou=s' h(ma=s
a)poti/batos a)gri/a no/sos.

w)kupe/ta| mo/rw| to\n me/leon fqi/sas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: klu/ous' e)/frica ta/sde sumfora/s, fi/lai,
a)/naktos, oi(/ais oi(=os w)\n e)lau/netai.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: w)= polla\ dh\ kai\ qerma\ kou) lo/gw| kaka\
kai\ xersi\ kai\ nw/toisi moxqh/sas e)gw/:
kou)/pw toiou=ton ou)/t' a)/koitis h( *dio\s
prou/qhken ou)/q' o( stugno\s *eu)rusqeu\s e)moi/,
oi(=on to/d' h( dolw=pis *oi)ne/ws ko/rh

u(fanto\n a)mfi/blhstron, w(=| dio/llumai.

be/brwke sa/rkas, pleu/mono/s t' a)rthri/as
r(ofei= cunoikou=n, e)k de\ xlwro\n ai(=ma/ mou
pe/pwken h)/dh, kai\ die/fqarmai de/mas
to\ pa=n, a)fra/stw| th=|de xeirwqei\s pe/dh|.
kou) tau=ta lo/gxh pedia/s, ou)/q' o( ghgenh\s
strato\s *giga/ntwn ou)/te qh/reios bi/a,
ou)/q' *(ella\s ou)/t' a)/glwssos ou)/q' o(/shn e)gw\
gai=an kaqai/rwn i(ko/mhn, e)/drase/ pw:
gunh\ de/, qh=lus fu=sa kou)k a)ndro\s fu/sin,
mo/nh me dh\ kaqei=le fasga/nou di/xa.
w)= pai=, genou= moi pai=s e)th/tumos gegw/s,
kai\ mh\ to\ mhtro\s o)/noma presbeu/sh|s ple/on.
do/s moi xeroi=n sai=n au)to\s e)c oi)/kou labw\n
e)s xei=ra th\n tekou=san, w(s ei)dw= sa/fa
ei) tou)mo\n a)lgei=s ma=llon h)\ kei/nhs o(rw=n
lwbhto\n ei)=dos e)n di/kh| kakou/menon.
i)/q', w)= te/knon, to/lmhson: oi)/ktiro/n te/ me
polloi=sin oi)ktro/n, o(/stis w(/ste parqe/nos
be/bruxa klai/wn, kai\ to/d' ou)d' a)\n ei(=s pote
to/nd' a)/ndra fai/h pro/sq' i)dei=n dedrako/ta,
a)ll' a)ste/naktos ai)e\n ei(po/mhn kakoi=s.
nu=n d' e)k toiou/tou qh=lus hu(/rhmai ta/las.
kai\ nu=n proselqw\n sth=qi plhsi/on patro/s,
ske/yai q' o(poi/as tau=ta sumfora=s u(/po
pe/ponqa: dei/cw ga\r ta/d' e)k kalumma/twn.
i)dou/, qea=sqe pa/ntes a)/qlion de/mas,
o(ra=te to\n du/sthnon, w(s oi)ktrw=s e)/xw.
ai)ai=, a)= ta/las,
e)/qalyen a)/ths spasmo\s a)rti/ws o(/d' au)=,
dih=|ce pleurw=n, ou)d' a)gu/mnasto/n m' e)a=n
e)/oiken h( ta/laina dia/boros no/sos.
w)=nac *)ai/dh, de/cai m',
w)= *dio\s a)kti/s, pai=son,
e)/nseison, w)=nac, e)gkata/skhyon be/los,
pa/ter, keraunou=: dai/nutai ga\r au)= pa/lin,
h)/nqhken, e)cwrmh/ken. w)= xe/res xe/res,
w)= nw=ta kai\ ste/rn', w)= fi/loi braxi/ones,
u(mei=s de\ kei=noi dh\ kaqe/staq', oi(/ pote
*neme/as e)/noikon, bouko/lwn a)la/stora
le/ont', a)/platon qre/mma ka)prosh/goron,
bi/a| kateirga/sasqe, *lernai/an q' u(/dran,
difuh= t' a)/mikton i(ppoba/mona strato\n
qhrw=n, u(bristh\n a)/nomon, u(pe/roxon bi/an,
*)eruma/nqio/n te qh=ra, to/n q' u(po\ xqono\s
*(/aidou tri/kranon sku/lak', a)pro/smaxon te/ras,
deinh=s *)exi/dnhs qre/mma, to/n te xruse/wn
dra/konta mh/lwn fu/lak' e)p' e)sxa/tois to/pois.
a)/llwn te mo/xqwn muri/wn e)geusa/mhn,
kou)dei\s tropai=' e)/sthse tw=n e)mw=n xerw=n.
nu=n d' w(=d' a)/narqros kai\ katerrakwme/nos
tuflh=s u(p' a)/ths e)kpepo/rqhmai ta/las,
o( th=s a)ri/sths mhtro\s w)nomasme/nos,
o( tou= kat' a)/stra *zhno\s au)dhqei\s go/nos.
a)ll' eu)= ge/ toi to/d' i)/ste, ka)\n to\ mhde\n w)=
ka)\n mhde\n e(/rpw, th/n ge dra/sasan ta/de
xeirw/somai ka)k tw=nde: prosmo/loi mo/non,
i(/n' e)kdidaxqh=| pa=sin a)gge/llein o(/ti
kai\ zw=n kakou/s ge kai\ qanw\n e)tisa/mhn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)= tlh=mon *(ella/s, pe/nqos oi(=on ei)sorw=
e(/cousan, a)ndro\s tou=de/ g' ei) sfalh/setai.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: e)pei\ pare/sxes a)ntifwnh=sai, pa/ter,
sigh\n parasxw\n klu=qi/ mou, nosw=n o(/mws:
ai)th/somai ga/r s' w(=n di/kaia tugxa/nein.
do/s moi seauto/n, mh\ tosou=ton w(s da/knei
qumw=| du/sorgos: ou) ga\r a)\n gnoi/hs e)n oi(=s
xai/rein proqumei= ka)n o(/tois a)lgei=s ma/thn.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: ei)pw\n o(\ xrh/|zeis lh=con: w(s e)gw\ nosw=n
ou)de\n cuni/hm' w(=n su\ poiki/lleis pa/lai.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: th=s mhtro\s h(/kw th=s e)mh=s fra/swn e)n oi(=s
nu=n e)stin w(/s q' h(/marten ou)x e(kousi/a.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: w)= pagka/kiste, kai\ paremnh/sw ga\r au)=
th=s patrofo/ntou mhtro/s, w(s klu/ein e)me/;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: e)/xei ga\r ou(/tws w(/ste mh\ siga=n pre/pein.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: ou) dh=ta toi=s ge pro/sqen h(marthme/nois.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: a)ll' ou)de\ me\n dh\ toi=s g' e)f' h(me/ran e)rei=s.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: le/g', eu)labou= de\ mh\ fanh=|s kako\s gegw/s.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: le/gw: te/qnhken a)rti/ws neosfagh/s.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: pro\s tou=; te/ras toi dia\ kakw=n e)qe/spisas.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: au)th\ pro\s au(th=s, ou)deno\s pro\s e)kto/pou.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: oi)/moi: pri\n w(s xrh=n sf' e)c e)mh=s qanei=n xero/s;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: ka)\n sou= strafei/h qumo/s, ei) to\ pa=n ma/qois.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: deinou= lo/gou kath=rcas: ei)pe\ d' h(=| noei=s.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: a(/pan to\ xrh=m', h(/marte xrhsta\ mwme/nh.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: xrh/st', w)= ka/kiste, pate/ra so\n ktei/nasa dra=|;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: ste/rghma ga\r dokou=sa prosbalei=n se/qen
a)ph/mplax', w(s prosei=de tou\s e)/ndon ga/mous.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: kai\ ti/s tosou=tos farmakeu\s *traxini/wn;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: *ne/ssos pa/lai *ke/ntauros e)ce/peise/ nin
toiw=|de fi/ltrw| to\n so\n e)kmh=nai po/qon.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: i)ou\ i)ou\ du/sthnos, oi)/xomai ta/las:
o)/lwl' o)/lwla, fe/ggos ou)ke/t' e)/sti moi.
oi)/moi, fronw= dh\ cumfora=s i(/n' e(/stamen.
i)/q', w)= te/knon, path\r ga\r ou)ke/t' e)/sti soi:
ka/lei to\ pa=n moi spe/rma sw=n o(maimo/nwn,
ka/lei de\ th\n ta/lainan *)alkmh/nhn, *dio\s
ma/thn a)/koitin, w(s teleutai/an e)mou=
fh/mhn pu/qhsqe qesfa/twn o(/s' oi)=d' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: a)ll' ou)/te mh/thr e)nqa/d', a)ll' e)pakti/a|
*ti/runqi sumbe/bhken w(/st' e)/xein e(/dran.
pai/dwn de\ tou\s me\n cullabou=s' au)th\ tre/fei,
tou\s d' a)\n to\ *qh/bhs a)/stu nai/ontas ma/qois:
h(mei=s d' o(/soi pa/resmen, ei)/ ti xrh/, pa/ter,
pra/ssein, klu/ontes e)cuphreth/somen.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: su\ d' ou)=n a)/koue tou)/rgon: e)ch/keis d' i(/na
fanei=s o(poi=os w)\n a)nh\r e)mo\s kalei=.
e)moi\ ga\r h)=n pro/fanton e)k patro\s pa/lai,
tw=n e)mpneo/ntwn mhdeno\s qanei=n u(/po,
a)ll' o(/stis *(/aidou fqi/menos oi)kh/twr pe/loi.
o(/d' ou)=n o( qh\r *ke/ntauros, w(s to\ qei=on h)=n
pro/fanton, ou(/tw zw=nta/ m' e)/kteinen qanw/n.
fanw= d' e)gw\ tou/toisi sumbai/nont' i)/sa
mantei=a kaina/, toi=s pa/lai cunh/gora,
a(\ tw=n o)rei/wn kai\ xamaikoitw=n e)gw\
*sellw=n e)selqw\n a)/lsos ei)segraya/mhn
pro\s th=s patrw/|as kai\ poluglw/ssou druo/s,
h(/ moi xro/nw| tw=| zw=nti kai\ paro/nti nu=n
e)/faske mo/xqwn tw=n e)festw/twn e)moi\
lu/sin telei=sqai: ka)do/koun pra/cein kalw=s.
to\ d' h)=n a)/r' ou)de\n a)/llo plh\n qanei=n e)me/.
toi=s ga\r qanou=si mo/xqos ou) prosgi/gnetai.
tau=t' ou)=n e)peidh\ lampra\ sumbai/nei, te/knon,
dei= s' au)= gene/sqai tw=|de ta)ndri\ su/mmaxon
kai\ mh\ 'pimei=nai tou)mo\n o)cu=nai sto/ma,
a)ll' au)to\n ei)kaqo/nta sumpra/ssein, no/mon
ka/lliston e)ceuro/nta, peiqarxei=n patri/.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: a)ll', w)= pa/ter, tarbw= me\n ei)s lo/gou sta/sin
toia/nd' e)pelqw/n, pei/somai d' a(/ soi dokei=.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: e)/mballe xei=ra decia\n prw/tista/ moi:

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: w(s pro\s ti/ pi/stin th/nd' a)/gan e)pistre/feis;

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: ou) qa=sson oi)/seis mhd' a)pisth/seis e)moi/;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: i)dou\ protei/nw, kou)de\n a)nteirh/setai.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: o)/mnu *dio/s nun tou= me fu/santos ka/ra,

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: h)= mh\n ti/ dra/sein; kai\ to/d' e)ceirh/setai;

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: h)= mh\n e)moi\ to\ lexqe\n e)/rgon e)ktelei=n.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: o)/mnum' e)/gwge, *zh=n' e)/xwn e)pw/moton.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: ei) d' e)kto\s e)/lqois, phmona\s eu)/xou labei=n.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: ou) mh\ la/bw: dra/sw ga/r: eu)/xomai d' o(/mws:

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: oi)=sq' ou)=n to\n *oi)/ths *zhno\s u(/yiston pa/gon;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: oi)=d', w(s quth/r ge polla\ dh\ staqei\s a)/nw.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: e)ntau=qa/ nun xrh\ tou)mo\n e)ca/ranta/ se
sw=m' au)to/xeira kai\ cu\n oi(=s xrh/|zeis fi/lwn.
pollh\n me\n u(/lhn th=s baqurri/zou druo\s
kei/ranta, pollo\n d' a)/rsen' e)ktemo/nq' o(mou=
a)/grion e)/laion, sw=ma tou)mo\n e)mbalei=n,
kai\ peuki/nhs labo/nta lampa/dos se/las
prh=sai. go/ou de\ mhde\n ei)si/tw da/kru,
a)ll' a)ste/naktos ka)da/krutos, ei)/per ei)=
tou=d' a)ndro/s, e)/rcon: ei) de\ mh/, menw= s' e)gw\
kai\ ne/rqen w)\n a)rai=os ei)saei\ baru/s.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: oi)/moi, pa/ter, ti/ d' ei)=pas; oi(=a/ m' ei)/rgasai.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: o(poi=a draste/' e)sti/n: ei) de\ mh/, patro\s
a)/llou genou= tou mhd' e)mo\s klhqh=|s e)/ti.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: oi)/moi ma/l' au)=qis, oi(=a/ m' e)kkalei=, pa/ter,
fone/a gene/sqai kai\ palamnai=on se/qen.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: ou) dh=t' e)/gwg', a)ll' w(=n e)/xw paiw/nion
kai\ mou=non i)ath=ra tw=n e)mw=n kakw=n.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: kai\ pw=s u(pai/qwn sw=m' a)\n i)w/|mhn to\ so/n;

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: a)ll' ei) fobei= pro\s tou=to, ta)/lla g' e)/rgasai.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: fora=s ge/ toi fqo/nhsis ou) genh/setai.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: h)= kai\ pura=s plh/rwma th=s ei)rhme/nhs;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: o(/son g' a)\n au)to\s mh\ potiyau/wn xeroi=n:
ta\ d' a)/lla pra/cw kou) kamei= tou)mo\n me/ros.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: a)ll' a)rke/sei kai\ tau=ta: pro/sneimai de/ moi
xa/rin braxei=an pro\s makroi=s a)/llois didou/s.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: ei) kai\ makra\ ka/rt' e)sti/n, e)rgasqh/setai.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: th\n *eu)rutei/an oi)=sqa dh=ta parqe/non;

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: *)io/lhn e)/lecas, w(/s g' e)peika/zein e)me/.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: e)/gnws. tosou=ton dh/ s' e)piskh/ptw, te/knon:
tau/thn e)mou= qano/ntos, ei)/per eu)sebei=n
bou/lei, patrw/|wn o(rki/wn memnhme/nos,
prosqou= da/marta, mhd' a)pisth/sh|s patri/:
mhd' a)/llos a)ndrw=n toi=s e)moi=s pleuroi=s o(mou=
kliqei=san au)th\n a)nti\ sou= la/bh| pote/,
a)ll' au)to/s, w)= pai=, tou=to kh/deuson le/xos.
pei/qou: to\ ga/r toi mega/la pisteu/sant' e)moi\
smikroi=s a)pistei=n th\n pa/ros sugxei= xa/rin.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: oi)/moi: to\ me\n nosou=nti qumou=sqai kako/n,
to\ d' w(=d' o(ra=n fronou=nta ti/s pot' a)\n fe/roi;

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: w(s e)rgasei/wn ou)de\n w(=n le/gw qroei=s.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: ti/s ga/r poq', h(/ moi mhtri\ me\n qanei=n mo/nh
metai/tios soi/ t' au)=qis w(s e)/xeis e)/xein,
ti/s tau=t' a)/n, o(/stis mh\ 'c a)lasto/rwn nosoi=,
e(/loito; krei=sson ka)me/ g', w)= pa/ter, qanei=n
h)\ toi=sin e)xqi/stoisi sunnai/ein o(mou=.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: a(nh\r o(/d', w(s e)/oiken, ou) nemei=n e)moi\
fqi/nonti moi=ran: a)lla/ toi qew=n a)ra\
menei= s' a)pisth/santa toi=s e)moi=s lo/gois.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: w)/moi, ta/x', w(s e)/oikas, w(s nosei=s fra/seis.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: su\ ga/r m' a)p' eu)nasqe/ntos e)kkinei=s kakou=.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: dei/laios, w(s e)s polla\ ta)porei=n e)/xw.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: ou) ga\r dikaioi=s tou= futeu/santos klu/ein.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: a)ll' e)kdidaxqw= dh=ta dussebei=n, pa/ter;

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: ou) dusse/beia, tou)mo\n ei) te/ryeis ke/ar.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: pra/ssein a)/nwgas ou)=n me pandi/kws ta/de;

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: e)/gwge: tou/twn ma/rturas kalw= qeou/s.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: toiga\r poh/sw kou)k a)pw/somai, to\ so\n
qeoi=si deiknu\s e)/rgon: ou) ga\r a)/n pote
kako\s fanei/hn soi/ ge pisteu/sas, pa/ter.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: kalw=s teleuta=|s, ka)pi\ toi=sde th\n xa/rin
taxei=an, w)= pai=, pro/sqes, w(s pri\n e)mpesei=n
sparagmo\n h)/ tin' oi)=stron, e)s pura/n me qh=|s.
a)/g' e)gkonei=t', ai)/resqe: pau=la/ toi kakw=n
au(/th, teleuth\ tou=de ta)ndro\s u(sta/th.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: a)ll' ou)de\n ei)/rgei soi\ teleiou=sqai ta/de,
e)pei\ keleu/eis ka)canagka/zeis, pa/ter.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: a)/ge nun, pri\n th/nd' a)nakinh=sai
no/son, w)= yuxh\ sklhra/, xa/lubos
liqoko/llhton sto/mion pare/xous',
a)na/paue boh/n, w(s e)pi/xarton
tele/ous' a)ekou/sion e)/rgon.

sp.speaker: *(/ullos
sp.l: ai)/ret', o)padoi/, mega/lhn me\n e)moi\
tou/twn qe/menoi suggnwmosu/nhn,
mega/lhn de\ qew=n a)gnwmosu/nhn
ei)do/tes e)/rgwn tw=n prassome/nwn,
oi(\ fu/santes kai\ klh|zo/menoi
pate/res toiau=t' e)forw=si pa/qh.
ta\ me\n ou)=n me/llont' ou)dei\s e)fora=|,
ta\ de\ nu=n e(stw=t' oi)ktra\ me\n h(mi=n,
ai)sxra\ d' e)kei/nois,
xalepw/tata d' ou)=n a)ndrw=n pa/ntwn
tw=| th/nd' a)/thn u(pe/xonti.
lei/pou mhde\ su/, parqe/n', a)p' oi)/kwn,
mega/lous me\n i)dou=sa ne/ous qana/tous,
polla\ de\ ph/mata kai\ kainopaqh=,
kou)de\n tou/twn o(/ ti mh\ *zeu/s.
